# CategoryOpenXR

Functions for creating OpenXR handles for [SDL_gpu](SDL_gpu) contexts.

For the most part, OpenXR operates independent of SDL, but the graphics
initialization depends on direct support from [SDL_gpu](SDL_gpu).
